examples: Her voice was shaking despite all her efforts to control it.
Su voz temblaba a pesar de todos sus esfuerzos por controlarla.
Despite applying for hundreds of jobs, he is still out of work.
A pesar de solicitar cientos de puestos de trabajo, todavía está sin trabajo.
She was good at physics despite the fact that she found it boring.
Era buena en física a pesar de que la encontraba aburrida.
He had to laugh despite himself.
Tuvo que reír a su pesar.
